definition: to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer

sentences.english: Dr. Peter Lee receives the award from Mrs. Selina Tsang.
sentences.chinese: 李仲賢博士接受特首夫人頒授獎狀。

sentences.english: Prof. Bei Dao was conferred an honorary degree of Doctor of Letters by Brown University.
sentences.chinese: 北島教授獲美國布朗大學頒授榮譽文學博士學位。

sentences.english: He was awarded Doctor of Social Sciences (honoris causa) degree by the University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 陳博士獲香港大學頒授名譽社會科學博士學位。
